name: emote-controlled
description: In this repository you find the code and data for the paper ["Emote-Controlled: Obtaining Implicit Viewer Feedback through Emote based Sentiment Analysis on Comments of Popular Twitch.tv Channels"](https://dl.acm.org/doi/abs/10.1145/3365523) by Konstantin Kobs et al., published in "Transactions on Social Computing":
